title: If you play on a friend's account to increase their rank, will you be banned?
body: I was thinking about helping some friends, but I dont know if it is not allowed. Thanks! ^.^

replies.body:
This is a solid definition of what MMR Boosting is, and is very much **not allowed**. Here's an excerpt from our [MMR/Elo Boosting FAQ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751834-MMR-Elo-Boosting):

>"MMR Boosting (Match Making Rating, also known as Elo Boosting) is an act where a player (The Booster) logs into another player's account (The Boostee) to play a ranked game. While it is generally accepted that the intent of this is to improve the Boostee's MMR, any ranked game played by someone that is not the original creator of the account may be considered Boosting and as a result may be eligible for punishment."

I think it's great that you want to help your friends, but I recommend giving them tips or watching them play and give them live advice during a game rather than boosting their account. Let me know if you have any other questions. ^.^
